comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: There are a couple of earlier photos of this building which show two floors and a ground floor verandah of only five bays, so the front door is in the middle. I wonder when the extensions happened? 1859 - acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=412599 1870 - acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=412085# And a contemporary comparison photo on Flickr - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32969137@N03/3181784986/]
